document_data.caption: A map showing Gawenknife Street and surroundings in the Field Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Gawenknife Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Gawenknife Street''' was a large road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Gawenknife Street was located in the eastern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Field Ward|Field Ward]]. It was easily the largest road in this section of the Field Ward, spanning east to west in between the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] and an unnamed courtyard near [[Endshift Street]]. Other roads that intersected Gawenknife Street included [[Logan's Walk]], [[the Semize]], and [[Chop Street]].
